titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired in the visitation, in the firste yere of the raigne of our moste dread soueraigne lady, Elizabeth by the grace of God, of Englande, Fraunce, and Irelande, Queene, defendour of the faith. &c. Anno. 1559.
Visitation articles. 1559
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

notesStmt.note: Imprint and suggested publication date from STC.
In title: 'enquired .. firste yere' (as in STC 10119); A2r last line: 'cupation.' and A3r line 15 ends: 'their'--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
